lrn.description: Local Routing Number, if assigned to the requested phone number

ported_status.description: Indicates whether or not the requested phone number has been ported

ported_date.description: ISO-formatted date when the requested phone number has been ported

ocn.description: Operating Company Name (OCN) as per the Local Exchange Routing Guide (LERG) database

altspid.description: Alternative SPID (Service Provider ID). Often used when a carrier is using a number from another carrier

city.description: City name extracted from the locality in the Local Exchange Routing Guide (LERG) database
